etymology.description: Depicts a left hand -> originally from 又 (yòu, "again") but flipped
etymology.interpretation: The character 𠂇 is a pictogram of a left hand, showing the shape of a hand turned in the opposite direction. It is sometimes visible in the top component of other characters like 灰(灰) (huī, "ash").

examples.chinese: 妈妈用布𠂇住窗户(媽媽用布𠂇住窗戶)。
examples.pinyin: Māmā yòng bù jiǎn zhù chuānghù.
examples.english: Mom covers the window with cloth.

examples.chinese: 为了防尘(為了防塵)，工人用塑料布𠂇住机器(工人用塑料布𠂇住機器)。
examples.pinyin: Wèile fángchén, gōngrén yòng sùliàobù jiǎn zhù jīqì.
examples.english: To prevent dust, the worker covers the machine with plastic cloth.
